"Waffle Ice Cream" - A waffle maker that is specifically designed to make ice cream waffles. It would have a special feature that allows for the ice cream to be frozen while it cooks in the waffle maker, resulting in a crispy waffle exterior with a soft and creamy interior. This would be a unique and delicious treat that combines the best of both worlds. Confidence score: 0.8

"Waffle Waffle Maker" - A waffle maker that is designed to make waffles that are filled with other waffles. It would have a special feature that allows for the waffles to be stacked on top of each other, resulting in a towering waffle sandwich. This would be a fun and creative way to enjoy waffles in a new and exciting way. Confidence score: 0.9
